Texts.Eng: <Translation: First, they did not believe me about ^red;<unknown>^reset;. Then they said I was crazy to even think such a creature could exist. And now they are ^red;<unknown>^reset; right where I told them to avoid. Twice, in fact. Yet here I sit in this cell, awaiting my death due to ^red;<unknown>^reset; lies, while they investigate the very thing>

that I was told could not exist in this reality. ^red;<unknown>^reset; the Hegemony! They are fathers of lies, and of deceptions. And now they have doomed our people in their greed. In a way, I suppose it is poetic justice for sticking our nose where it doesn't belong. Science is not meant to know all things. And now our own hubris consumes us forever.>
